ch0215_00_lutia/0101_0701_01_10:
Hiiiiii, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Lisia here!
Dazzling, dizzying, doldrums defying!
ch0215_00_lutia/0101_0701_02_10:
I can see you’re just brimming with energy! Keep
it up, and you’ll be ready to shine in no time!
ch0215_00_lutia/0601_0701_01_10:
We contest idols get to wear tons of different
styles of clothes. Some are chic and cool, others
are cute—there are just so many!
ch0215_00_lutia/0601_0701_02_10:
It’s so hard to discover a new you if you always
just wear the same style!
ch0215_00_lutia/0601_0701_03_10:
Becoming my best self is hard, and sometimes I get
really discouraged, but the trick is to just give it
your best shot and never give up!
ch0215_00_lutia/0601_0701_04_10:
But I know you’re already super well aware
of that!
ch0215_00_lutia/0602_0701_01_10:
Have I ever told you how wonderful it is to be a
contest idol?
ch0215_00_lutia/0602_0701_02_10: I bet you could become an amazing star yourself!
ch0215_00_lutia/0602_0701_03_10:
You should come to Hoenn sometime to make your
contest debut!
ch0215_00_lutia/0602_0701_05_10:
Let’s make it a promise, OK? I’m excited to see
how you do!
ch0215_00_lutia/0603_0701_01_10:
Who do you think would make a better contest
idol—someone super cute or someone super cool?
ch0215_00_lutia/0603_0701_02_10:
It was a trick question! Anyone can become a
contest idol!
ch0215_00_lutia/0603_0701_03_10: “You Can Do It! Your Possibilities Are Endless!”
ch0215_00_lutia/0603_0701_04_10: Let’s all be contest stars together!
ch0215_00_lutia/0604_0701_01_10:
There’s no need to fear! ♪
We’re here to bring the cheer! ♪
The exciting Passion of Pasio! ♪
ch0215_00_lutia/0604_0701_02_10:
Hmmm. I’m trying to come up with a song and
dance number to perform onstage based on this
wonderful island, Pasio...
ch0215_00_lutia/0604_0701_03_10:
but I’m worried that if I include every little thing I
want to include, it’ll just end up a chaotic mess!
ch0215_00_lutia/0604_0701_04_10:
OK! No more thinking! I’m just gonna dance and
sing to my heart’s content to show everyone the
passion of Pasio!
ch0215_00_lutia/0605_0701_01_10:
Is there anyone you look up to as a role
model, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0215_00_lutia/0605_0701_02_10:
Seeing my uncle compete in contests is what made
me decide to try them out.
ch0215_00_lutia/0605_0701_03_10:
He’s also my mentor, and I always dreamed of
surpassing him! But one day, I realized something.
ch0215_00_lutia/0605_0701_04_10:
I don’t have to surpass him at all! He has his good
points, and I have mine! We can both shine in our
own unique ways!
ch0215_00_lutia/0605_0701_05_10:
It’s kinda like how all the stars in the night sky
shine differently, but they’re all equally important!
ch0215_00_lutia/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, right! I have something for you!
ch0215_00_lutia/1701_0701_02_10: I hope you can put it to good use!
ch0215_00_lutia/1701_0702_01_10:
That’s one of my favorite items! It would make me
really happy if you’d use it!
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0701_01_10:
I think the people here on Pasio are finally
beginning to get a feel for what contests are
all about!
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0701_02_10: Thanks for helping me spread the word!
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0701_03_10:
I want to get a bunch of contest fans together
here on Pasio and have a mini contest! We could
call it...
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0701_04_10: “Encounter on Pasio! A Special Fan Meet-Up!”
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0702_01_10:
I hope one of the people I meet on Pasio becomes
a new contest star.
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0702_02_10:
It would be so awesome to take the stage
alongside them!
ch0215_00_lutia/2501_0702_03_10:
I’d love to get up on the contest stage in Hoenn
together with you one day!
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0701_01_10:
I just had a super-great idea! I mean
really fantastic!
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0701_02_10:
Let’s have the sygna suit designer make a contest
outfit for you!
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0701_03_10:
We could have him make an outfit for me, too,
and hold a Pasio sygna suit performance together!
Wouldn’t that be cool?
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0701_04_10:
“Wait for It! The Amazing Sygna Suit of Your
Dreams!” Yeah, we really have to make this
a reality!
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0702_01_10:
I keep having all these great ideas! I’m living the
Pasio dream!
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0702_02_10:
There are so many interesting people here on
Pasio that it’s almost hard NOT to be inspired all
the time!
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0702_03_10:
I hope I can inspire you to do something
great, too.
ch0215_00_lutia/2511_0702_04_10:
Inspiring each other and growing together—that’s
what friends are for, isn’t it?
ch0215_00_lutia/3001_0701_01_10:
It’s a new day and the start of a new story!
Today, your story’s called...“Is This a Dream?
Am I a Future Contest Star?” Ahhh, I love it!
ch0215_00_lutia/3003_0701_01_10:
Hiiiiii! Your favorite contest idol is ready to have
some serious fun on Pasio today!
ch0215_00_lutia/3005_0701_01_10:
Heyyy, contest stars aren’t allowed to stay up late!
Come on, it’s bedtime...unless you wanna be a
sleepyhead tomorrow morning.
